Main Scripts¶

These scripts run sensor readings on the Wheelchair RPi side

main_code.py¶

This file controls sensor measurements for the Wheelchair

main_code.SoC(sd_time, dt, ibat, vbat)¶

This function updates the State Of Charge (SoC) by integrating over dt

Parameters

  • sd_time – last shutdown time

  • dt – change in time

  • ibat – current of the battery

  • vbat – voltage of the battery

main_code.get_I2C()¶

This function communicates with the IMU, BME680, and BMS sensors over I2C to acquire data

Parameters

  • gdt – each gdt seconds the data is obtained from ESP and other sensors

  • csv_time – each csv_time*gdt seconds the data is save in CSV file

Each 25*gdt = 5 seconds the data is updated in WriteGUIBMS.txt file, from which the GUI takes the data to show The data saved in WriteGUIBMS.txt file is the data that averaged over 5 seconds, while CSV file data is not average, but simultaneous values

You can easily make it average if needed by logic

main_code.get_serial()¶

This function handles GPS data acquisition

main_code.runProgram()¶

This function runs the processes when testing the file independently :return:
